articles.title: "Set Country On Fire": Supreme Court Slams Ex BJP Spokesperson Nupur Sharma
articles.description: The Supreme Court today blamed former BJP spokesperson Nupur Sharma for igniting tension with her comments on Prophet Muhammad and said "she and her loose tongue have set the country on fire".
articles.content:
Nupur Sharma made the offensive comments during a TV debate earlier this month (File)

articles.title: Udaipur murder: CCTV footage shows accused running away after beheading tailor
articles.description: In the CCTV footage which has come to the fore it can be seen that after killing Kanhaiya Lal the accused, Riyaz Akhtari and Ghaus Mohammad, are running away from the murder scene.

articles.description: "Rs 1.40 lakh crore seems to be the rough bottom line. We're not going below that," Nirmala Sitharaman said.

articles.title: TS TET Results 2022 releasing today on tstet.cgg.gov.in, check direct link and updates
articles.description: TS TET 2022 Results are expected to be released today - July 1, 2022. Final answer keys have been released and already available on official website for all subjects. Results would be released soon on tstet.cgg.gov.in. Check direct link and latest updates.
